Identity.Tooltip: The Thing was the center of a Germanic community. Here, the tribesmen convened to discuss all matters of importance.\nBuild to acquire large tracts of territory. Train citizens. Garrison: 20.
Identity.History: "About minor matters the chiefs deliberate, about the more important the whole tribe. [...] They assemble [...] on certain fixed dates. Then the king [...] is heard, more because he has influence to persuade han because he has power to command."\nTacitus, De Origine et situ Germanorum, 98 CE.
